title: The Diary of Husband Selection - Novel Updates
author: Dark, Silent And Cold Pearl   墨晏寒珠
description:
Three years ago, he was the son of the richest man in Yang Province, and she was a desperate prostitute.

He saved her, but when she wanted to repay him with her body, he pushed her away.

Three years later, he was still the young master of the wealthiest clan in Yang Province, but she had become a noble and revered County Princess.

Again, he refused her, but this time, she wanted to be the master of her own destiny.>
